attributes.action: Build a statue of tupac in Portsmouth guildhall
attributes.additional_details: He was a voice of the people
attributes.background: I want a statue of tupac in Portsmouth because there are many of his fans here and he deserves to be remembered

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this is something that the UK Government and Parliament is not responsible for.

This would be a decision for the owners of the guildhall.
